apiroute.title: URI of the WIFI controller.
apiroute.description: Should be in the format of: http://aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd

uuid.title: Client UUID token.
uuid.description: Should be a 32 digit hex string

swingMode.title: Swing mode
swingMode.description: Some Daikin ACs support different swing modes.

disableFan.title: Fan disabled
disableFan.description: Whether to have both AC and Fan or only AC

fanMode.title: Fan mode
fanMode.description: Choose between normal fan or dry mode

fanPowerMode.title: Fan power mode
fanPowerMode.description: Should Fan power only affect the fan or complete device.

fanName.title: FAN name
fanName.description: The name of the fan. Only applies if the FAN has not been disabled.

defaultMode.title: Default operation mode
defaultMode.description: When turning on the Daikin device in HomeBridge using a single-tap, the default operation mode will be applied.

response.title: Response
response.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the device to start responding.  Default: 2000 (2 seconds).

deadline.title: Deadline
deadline.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the device to complete a response.  Default: 60000 (one minute).

retries.title: Retries
retries.description: The plugin can retry to reconnect in case of a connection problem. Default: 5.
